betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oSpectral relays can be used to boost the starlight if placed around an altar. 

You need to build a 3x3 structure with sooty marble in the middle, chiseled marble in the corners, marble arches in the edges. Place the relay on the sooty marble.

If multiple of these structures are too close together, they will actually lower the starlight level.
